title: What is the difference between semester and session? - Quora

response.answer_text: Usually in Universities world over the academic year is divided into two parts called semesters, this especially for undergraduate programs. This is because at postgraduate level it is common to hear about a trimester, which means the academic year is divided into three parts. It is in these semester periods that the year’s academic program is accomplished. A semester will usually be divided into sessions interluded with or without breaks, during which specific subjects or topics are studied as units.
